author: fwyzard
body:
Update alpaka to the HEAD of the [develop](https://github.com/alpaka-group/alpaka/tree/develop/) branch as of 2022.08.11, corresponding to the commit [30d205f46d7f9235dd49b4cccd4d2daaa25e0f04](https://github.com/alpaka-group/alpaka/commit/30d205f46d7f9235dd49b4cccd4d2daaa25e0f04) .

Relevant changes:
  - update and refactor HIP/CUDA atomic implementations
  - update and clean up Update SysInfo.hpp
title: Update alpaka to the develop branch as of 2022.08.11 [12.4.x]
